text: Leroy Russel Burrell (born February 21, 1967) is an American track and field athlete. He twice set the world record for the 100 m sprint. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Burrell won a gold medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics. Burrell married Olympic gold medalist Michelle Finn-Burrell in 1992. They have three sons; including sprinter Cameron Burrell. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:African-American track and field athletes Category:American sprinters Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:World record holders
title: Leroy Burrell
